full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DUL t'IK NYI MA'I 'OD ZER LEGS BSHAD LUNG RIGS KYI RGYA MTSO LAS DGE SLONG MA'I RNAM 'BYED ZHUB SPYIR BSTAN GZHI SMAD DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @215A *, ,GSER GYI SA GZHI RGYA CHE JI BZHIN 'DI YIS GZHAN PHAN RGYA CHE ZHING, ,GANGGA'I CHU BO RGYUN RING JI BZHIN 'DI LAS GZHAN PHAN RGYUN RING DANG, ,'JIG RTEN RTZI SMAN SNA TSOGS JI BZHIN 'DIS KYANG GZHAN PHAN SNA TSOGS SHING, ,DPAG BSAM 'BRAS BU LHUN GRUB JI BZHIN GZHAN PHAN LHUN GYIS GRUB PAR SMON, ,THUGS DGONGS RNAM DAG DANG BA'I MKHA' LA BYAMS PA'I TING 'DZIN SPRIN 'KHRIGS SHING, ,THUGS RJE'I GLOG 'KHYUG SNYAN PA'I 'BRUG SGRA PHYOGS SU GSAL BAR GRAGS, ,LEGS GSUNGS DAM CHOS BDUD RTZI'I CHAR GYIS PHAN BDE'I ME TOG RGYAS MDZAD DE'I, ,BKA' DRIN CHEN PO RJES SU DRAN PAS GUS PA CHEN POS BDAG PHYAG 'TSAL, ,'DUL BA MDO RTZA BA'I RNAM BSHAD NYI MA'I 'OD ZER ZHES BYA BA LEGS BSHAD LUNG GI RGYA MTSO ZHES KYANG BYA BA 'DI NI MKHAS PA CHEN PO DPAL LDAN ZANGS CHEN BA'I ZHABS KYI PADMO SPYI BOS BLANGS NAS GSUNG LEGS @215B BSHAD BDUD RTZI'I RO MCHOG LEGS PAR MYANGS PA'I MTSO SNA BA, DGE SLONG SHES RAB BZANG POS 'DUL BA LUNG DANG LUNG 'GREL RGYA MTSO LTA BU'I GZHUNG LUGS RNAMS LA LO BCU PHRAG DU MAR LEGS PAR BRTAGS NAS GZHAN LA PHAN BLOS RNAM PAR BSKYOD PA'I SHUGS KYIS, TSIG GSAL ZHING DON GO SLA BA GTZO BOR BYAS TE, NYE BAR SBYAR BA RDZOGS SO,, ,,
